import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import * as d3 from 'd3' const constants = { linear: [ 306.06644452, 0.00430901514 ], quadratic: [ 314.574751, 0.00210065413, 0.0000000973625567 ], cosine: [ 314.569048, 0.00210632696, 0.0000000970576557, 2.86111474, -0.554076698] } class App extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { originalData: [], styles: { dark: '#333344', normal: '#555566', light: '#999999', line: '#EEEEEE', theme: '#4BA824' }, chartState: 'initial' } this.createLineChart = this.createLineChart.bind(this) } createLineChart(data) { let margin = {top: 20, right: 60, bottom: 40, left: 0}, width = 800, height = 600, innerWidth = width - margin.left - margin.right, innerHeight = height - margin.top - margin.bottom, svg = d3.select('#App') .append('svg') .attr('width', width) .attr('height', height), x = d3.scaleTime() .domain(d3.extent(data, (d, i) => {return d.date})) .range([0, innerWidth]) .nice(), y = d3.scaleLinear() .domain(d3.extent(data, (d, i) => {return d.level})) .range([innerHeight, 0]) .nice(), totalLength = null // Grid lines svg.append('g') .attr('class', 'y grid') .attr('transform', 'translate(' + margin.left + ', ' + height + ')') .attr("stroke-dasharray", height + " " + height) .attr("stroke-dashoffset", height) .transition() .duration(720) .ease(d3.easeQuad) .attr('stroke-dashoffset', 0) .call(d3.axisBottom(x) .ticks(5) .tickSize(-height) .tickFormat('') ) svg.append('g') .attr('class', 'x grid') .attr('transform', 'translate(' + margin.left + ', ' + margin.top + ')') .attr("stroke-dasharray", width + " " + width) .attr("stroke-dashoffset", width) .transition() .duration(720) .ease(d3.easeQuad) .attr('stroke-dashoffset', 0) .call(d3.axisLeft(y) .ticks(5) .tickSize(-width) .tickFormat('') ) // Axes svg.append('g') .attr('class', 'x axis') .attr('transform', 'translate(' + margin.left + ', ' + (innerHeight + margin.top) + ')') .style("opacity", 0) .transition() .duration(720) .ease(d3.easeQuad) .style('opacity', 1) .call(d3.axisBottom(x) .ticks(5) .tickSize(0) .tickPadding(24)) svg.append('g') .attr('class', 'y axis') .attr('transform', 'translate(' + (innerWidth + margin.left) + ', ' + margin.top + ')') .style("opacity", 0) .transition() .duration(720) .ease(d3.easeQuad) .style('opacity', 1) .call(d3.axisRight(y) .ticks(5) .tickSize(0) .tickPadding(32)) svg.append('line') .attr('class', 'bottom-axis') .attr("x1", 0) .attr("y1", height - margin.bottom) .attr("x2", width) .attr("y2", height - margin.bottom) .style("opacity", 0) .transition() .duration(720) .ease(d3.easeQuad) .style('opacity', 1) // Main data line let dataLine = svg.append('path') .datum(data) .attr('class', 'data-line') .attr('d', d3.line() .x(function(d) { return x(d.date) + margin.left }) .y(function(d) { return y(d.level) + margin.top }) ) // Animate data line totalLength = dataLine.node().getTotalLength() dataLine.attr("stroke-dasharray", totalLength + " " + totalLength) .attr("stroke-dashoffset", totalLength) .transition() .delay(720) .duration(600) .ease(d3.easeCubicOut) .attr('stroke-dashoffset', 0) let updateReg = function(newState) { let regLineLength = null, minDate = d3.min(data, function(d) {return d.date}), xDays = data.map(d => Math.ceil((d.date.getTime() - minDate.getTime())/(1000*60*60*24))), yReg = null switch(newState) { case 'linear': yReg = xDays.map(d => constants.linear[0] + constants.linear[1]*d) let regLine = svg.append('path') .datum(data) .attr('class', 'reg-line') .attr('d', d3.line() .x(function(d) { return x(d.date) + margin.left }) .y(function(d, i) {return y(yReg[i]) + margin.top }) ), regLineLabel = svg.append('g') .attr('class', 'reg-line-label') .attr('transform', 'translate(' + (x(data[Math.ceil(data.length*0.52)]['date']) + margin.left + 60) + ', ' + (y(yReg[Math.ceil(yReg.length*0.52)]) + margin.top + 20) + ')' ) regLineLabel.style('opacity', 0) .transition() .duration(720) .ease(d3.easeQuad) .style('opacity', 1) regLineLabel.append('rect') .attr('class', 'reg-line-label-rect linear') let regLineLabelText = regLineLabel.append('text') .attr('class', 'reg-line-label-text') regLineLabelText.append('tspan') .attr('class', 'linear span') .text('y = αx') regLineLength = regLine.node().getTotalLength() regLine.attr("stroke-dasharray", regLineLength + " " + regLineLength) .attr("stroke-dashoffset", regLineLength) .transition() .duration(600) .ease(d3.easeQuadOut) .attr('stroke-dashoffset', 0) dataLine.node().style.stroke = 'var(--line)' d3.selectAll('.reg-line-label-text>tspan:not(.linear)') .each(function(d) { let currentSpan = d3.select(this) if (!currentSpan.node().classList.contains('off')) { currentSpan.node().classList.add('off') } }) break case 'quadratic': yReg = xDays.map(d => constants.quadratic[0] + constants.quadratic[1]*d + constants.quadratic[2]*d**2) d3.select('.reg-line').transition() .duration(600) .ease(d3.easeQuadOut) .attr('d', d3.line() .x(function(d) { return x(d.date) + margin.left }) .y(function(d, i) {return y(yReg[i]) + margin.top }) ) regLineLength = d3.select('.reg-line').node().getTotalLength() d3.select('.reg-line').attr("stroke-dasharray", 0) .attr('stroke-dashoffset', 0) d3.select('.reg-line-label-rect') .attr('class', 'reg-line-label-rect quadratic') d3.select('.reg-line-label-text').append('tspan') .attr('class', 'quadratic span') .text(' + βx\u00b2') .style('opacity', 0) .transition() .duration(720) .ease(d3.easeQuad) .style('opacity', 1) d3.selectAll('.reg-line-label-text>tspan:not(.quadratic)') .each(function(d) { let currentSpan = d3.select(this) if (!currentSpan.node().classList.contains('off')) { currentSpan.node().classList.add('off') } }) break case 'cosine': yReg = xDays.map(d => constants.cosine[0] + constants.cosine[1]*d + constants.cosine[2]*d**2 + constants.cosine[3]*Math.cos(2*Math.PI*d/365.25 + constants.cosine[4]) ) d3.select('.reg-line').attr("stroke-dasharray", regLineLength + " " + regLineLength) .transition() .duration(600) .ease(d3.easeCubicOut) .attr('d', d3.line() .x(function(d) { return x(d.date) + margin.left }) .y(function(d, i) {return y(yReg[i]) + margin.top }) ) regLineLength = d3.select('.reg-line').node().getTotalLength() d3.select('.reg-line').attr("stroke-dasharray", 0) .attr('stroke-dashoffset', 0) d3.select('.reg-line-label-rect') .attr('class', 'reg-line-label-rect cosine') d3.select('.reg-line-label-text').append('tspan') .attr('class', 'cosine span') .text(' + cos(2πt + φ)') .style('opacity', 0) .transition() .duration(720) .ease(d3.easeQuad) .style('opacity', 1) d3.selectAll('.reg-line-label-text>tspan:not(.cosine)') .each(function(d) { let currentSpan = d3.select(this) if (!currentSpan.node().classList.contains('off')) { currentSpan.node().classList.add('off') } }) break default: } } this.setState({ updateReg: updateReg }) } componentDidMount() { d3.csv('data/weekly_in_situ_co2_mlo.csv').then(data => { data.forEach(function(d) { d.date = d3.timeParse('%Y-%m-%d')(d.date) d.level = +d.level }) this.setState({ originalData: data }, () => this.createLineChart(this.state.originalData)) }) window.addEventListener('click', () => { if (this.state.chartState === 'initial') { this.setState({ chartState: 'linear' }, () => this.state.updateReg('linear')) } else if (this.state.chartState === 'linear') { this.setState({ chartState: 'quadratic' }, () => this.state.updateReg('quadratic')) } else if (this.state.chartState === 'quadratic') { this.setState({ chartState: 'cosine' }, () => this.state.updateReg('cosine')) } }) } render() { let styles = this.state.styles return (
) } } export default App;
